Self-care for health workers 
How to minimise burn out? 
• Get enough sleep
• Exercise
• Eat healthily
• Take care of your physical and mental health
• Take time out to relax
• Do things that you enjoy, including creative activities
• Spend time with loved ones
• Identify support networks and use them
• Ask for help when you need it.
